title: Brazilian supreme court orders suspension of X amid feud with Elon Musk
content: Elon Musk's social media platform, X, has been suspended in Brazil by a supreme court justice after Musk refused to appoint a local representative. Internet service providers and app stores have five days to block access, and fines will be imposed for VPN usage. The suspension stems from ongoing disputes over compliance with court orders.
summary: Elon Musk's social media platform, X, has been suspended in Brazil by a supreme court justice after Musk refused to appoint a local representative. Internet service providers and app stores have five days to block access, and fines will be imposed for VPN usage. The suspension stems from ongoing disputes over compliance with court orders.

title: Venezuela faces widespread power outage; interior minister blames 'terrorist attack'
content: Venezuela encountered a widespread power outage, which the government attributed to sabotage against line 765, affecting various states. Interior Minister Diosdado Cabello termed it a terrorist attack. The Maduro administration holds opposition sectors responsible. This development comes amid mass protests over President Maduro's contentious electoral win, calling for election transparency.
summary: Venezuela encountered a widespread power outage, which the government attributed to sabotage against line 765, affecting various states. Interior Minister Diosdado Cabello termed it a terrorist attack. The Maduro administration holds opposition sectors responsible. This development comes amid mass protests over President Maduro's contentious electoral win, calling for election transparency.

title: Raleigh sets record for hottest August 29, with 101 degrees
content: Raleigh has seen a record-breaking temperature of 101 degrees on August 29th, surpassing the previous high set in 1948. The National Weather Service warns of potential evening storms with damaging winds. Highs will drop to the 90s by Friday with isolated storms possible over the weekend. Temperatures may further decrease to the 70s and 50s next week.
summary: Raleigh has seen a record-breaking temperature of 101 degrees on August 29th, surpassing the previous high set in 1948. The National Weather Service warns of potential evening storms with damaging winds. Highs will drop to the 90s by Friday with isolated storms possible over the weekend. Temperatures may further decrease to the 70s and 50s next week.

title: Watch: Planes struggle to land at Fukuoka airport as typhoon Shanshan hits Japan
content: Strong winds from Typhoon Shanshan have forced several planes to abort their landings at Fukuoka airport. The storm is anticipated to reach Tokyo this weekend, potentially disrupting travel with numerous flight cancellations and suspended train services. Authorities have issued the highest alert, urging evacuations for over five million people in southern Japan. ​​​ The storm has resulted in at least four deaths, and hundreds of thousands of homes are without power​​.
summary: Strong winds from Typhoon Shanshan have forced several planes to abort their landings at Fukuoka airport. The storm is anticipated to reach Tokyo this weekend, potentially disrupting travel with numerous flight cancellations and suspended train services. Authorities have issued the highest alert, urging evacuations for over five million people in southern Japan. ​​​ The storm has resulted in at least four deaths, and hundreds of thousands of homes are without power​​.

title: French retiree accused of recruiting over 50 strangers to rape his wife after drugging her
content: A 71-year-old retiree from France faces trial in Avignon for allegedly coordinating the drugged rape of his wife by recruiting strangers online. Investigations revealed thousands of rape instances documented on his computer. The wife, unaware due to heavy sedation, discovered the abuse in 2020. Alongside him, 50 men face charges. The defendants claimed the acts were consensual, but the trial aims to establish their awareness of her condition. The trial is expected to run until December.
summary: A 71-year-old retiree from France faces trial in Avignon for allegedly coordinating the drugged rape of his wife by recruiting strangers online. Investigations revealed thousands of rape instances documented on his computer. The wife, unaware due to heavy sedation, discovered the abuse in 2020. Alongside him, 50 men face charges. The defendants claimed the acts were consensual, but the trial aims to establish their awareness of her condition. The trial is expected to run until December.

title: When Kamala Harris' father disapproved of her 'identity politics' in 2019
content: A Marxist economist, emeritus professor of Stanford University, Donald J Harris was was made a senior economic advisor of the Jamaican government in the early 1990s. But now Donald J Harris stays in Washington DC, near to the White House with Carol Kirlew, Kamala Harris' step mother. Donald J Harris wanted to stay out of the political hullabaloo but this campaign, he is being dragged every time Kamala Harris' ethnicity, political leaning is on the radar.
summary: A Marxist economist, emeritus professor of Stanford University, Donald J Harris was was made a senior economic advisor of the Jamaican government in the early 1990s. But now Donald J Harris stays in Washington DC, near to the White House with Carol Kirlew, Kamala Harris' step mother. Donald J Harris wanted to stay out of the political hullabaloo but this campaign, he is being dragged every time Kamala Harris' ethnicity, political leaning is on the radar.

title: State representative Shawn Thierry switches to Republican Party after primary defeat
content: Texas State Representative Shawn Thierry has decided to switch parties and join the Republicans after being defeated in the Democratic primary for her Houston seat. Thierry has criticised the Democratic Party for its stance on issues like gender transition for minors and changes to Title IX. Governor Greg Abbott and House Speaker Dade Phelan welcomed the move. Her term ends on January 14, with her successor to be decided in the November 5 election.
summary: Texas State Representative Shawn Thierry has decided to switch parties and join the Republicans after being defeated in the Democratic primary for her Houston seat. Thierry has criticised the Democratic Party for its stance on issues like gender transition for minors and changes to Title IX. Governor Greg Abbott and House Speaker Dade Phelan welcomed the move. Her term ends on January 14, with her successor to be decided in the November 5 election.

title: 2 things Kamala Harris doing for debate preparation: Remain calm and...
content: ​Kamala Harris has been asked to remain calm and instead focus on talking about Donald Trump's presidency. Harris may bring up issues like Trump's response to Covid pandemic, failure to get Mexico to pay for the southern border wall etc. Her team is preparing herself for situation when Trump attacks her personally, but she has to sidestep that. Harris' team also plans to emphasize on Trump's advanced age and lack of details on policy proposals.
summary: ​Kamala Harris has been asked to remain calm and instead focus on talking about Donald Trump's presidency. Harris may bring up issues like Trump's response to Covid pandemic, failure to get Mexico to pay for the southern border wall etc. Her team is preparing herself for situation when Trump attacks her personally, but she has to sidestep that. Harris' team also plans to emphasize on Trump's advanced age and lack of details on policy proposals.

title: Did Barron Trump say he earned respect of those willing to sacrifice for the country?
content: A screenshot claiming to show a message from Barron Trump, asserting he has earned the respect of those willing to sacrifice for the country, is not from an official account. Trump spokesperson and Melania Trump's office confirmed that Barron has no active social media presence and did not make such a statement. The post appears on an account named “Barron Trump New,” which is not affiliated with the Trump campaign.
summary: A screenshot claiming to show a message from Barron Trump, asserting he has earned the respect of those willing to sacrifice for the country, is not from an official account. Trump spokesperson and Melania Trump's office confirmed that Barron has no active social media presence and did not make such a statement. The post appears on an account named “Barron Trump New,” which is not affiliated with the Trump campaign.

title: Who is shaman Durek Verret, Norway's clairvoyant princess is getting married to?
content: African-American shaman Durek Verrett believes cancer is a choice and has once recommended some exercises to remove imprints from women's vaginas left by previous partners. The Hollywood's shaman will be the husband to Norway's princess Martha Louise who is a clairvoyant and teaches students to do miracles, talk to angels.
summary: African-American shaman Durek Verrett believes cancer is a choice and has once recommended some exercises to remove imprints from women's vaginas left by previous partners. The Hollywood's shaman will be the husband to Norway's princess Martha Louise who is a clairvoyant and teaches students to do miracles, talk to angels.

title: Nasa removes two astronauts from Space X flight to accommodate Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore stranded at ISS
content: Nasa plans to remove two astronauts from a SpaceX mission to make room for two ISS astronauts, Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore, who will return early due to safety concerns with their Boeing Starliner capsule. The adjustments ensure their February return with Nick Hague and Aleksandr Gorbunov, while other astronauts are deferred to future flights. The agency said that factors such as spaceflight experience were considered in making this decision.
summary: Nasa plans to remove two astronauts from a SpaceX mission to make room for two ISS astronauts, Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore, who will return early due to safety concerns with their Boeing Starliner capsule. The adjustments ensure their February return with Nick Hague and Aleksandr Gorbunov, while other astronauts are deferred to future flights.  The agency said that factors such as spaceflight experience were considered in making this decision.

title: Stepping out of office for coffee? This Australian company doesn't allow
content: An Australian mining firm faces backlash over claims by managing director Chris Ellison that coffee breaks are too expensive. Ellison wants employees kept in the office all day and criticizes remote work costs. The Perth-based office includes various amenities to encourage on-site work. The policy is part of a broader industry trend against remote work. Last week, the head of London-based smartphone maker Nothing declared a shift to fully office-based work, ending their hybrid model.
summary: An Australian mining firm faces backlash over claims by managing director Chris Ellison that coffee breaks are too expensive. Ellison wants employees kept in the office all day and criticizes remote work costs. The Perth-based office includes various amenities to encourage on-site work. The policy is part of a broader industry trend against remote work. Last week, the head of London-based smartphone maker Nothing declared a shift to fully office-based work, ending their hybrid model.

title: Strangers lock crying child in plane's bathroom in China: 'Won't let you out unless...'
content: Two women, irritated by a crying child on a Juneyao Airlines flight, took the child from her grandmother and locked her in the restroom. The incident, which occurred on August 24 and was filmed by one of the women, led to public outrage when posted on social media. The airline later apologized for the crew's negligence.
summary: Two women, irritated by a crying child on a Juneyao Airlines flight, took the child from her grandmother and locked her in the restroom. The incident, which occurred on August 24 and was filmed by one of the women, led to public outrage when posted on social media. The airline later apologized for the crew's negligence.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy says he gets why Kamala Harris replaced Biden. Elon Musk agrees
content: ​"Kamala’s interview last night was a reminder that we’re not running against a candidate. We’re running against a *system*. They require a candidate they can control, which means having original ideas is a disqualification. That’s exactly why we get Biden, then Kamala, and so on," Vivek wrote on X. Elon Musk who openly endorsed Donald Trump agreed to Vivek Ramaswamy's theory.
summary: ​"Kamala’s interview last night was a reminder that we’re not running against a candidate. We’re running against a *system*. They require a candidate they can control, which means having original ideas is a disqualification. That’s exactly why we get Biden, then Kamala, and so on," Vivek wrote on X. Elon Musk who openly endorsed Donald Trump agreed to Vivek Ramaswamy's theory.

title: 'Hawk Tuah Girl' launches 'dream' animal foundation after viral fame
content: Hailey Welch, famed as 'Hawk Tuah Girl,' has started her animal foundation, Paws Across America. Announced on social media, the 22-year-old seeks to aid animal charities across the US with awareness, advocacy, and financial help. Welch showcased her initial visit to a Tennessee animal shelter, with her video gaining ample attention online. She shares intentions to leverage her popularity and resources to support animals, emphasising adoption. Welch's announcement quickly gained traction, with her video amassing over 260,000 views on X and nearly 700,000 on Instagram.
summary: Hailey Welch, famed as 'Hawk Tuah Girl,' has started her animal foundation, Paws Across America. Announced on social media, the 22-year-old seeks to aid animal charities across the US with awareness, advocacy, and financial help. Welch showcased her initial visit to a Tennessee animal shelter, with her video gaining ample attention online. She shares intentions to leverage her popularity and resources to support animals, emphasising adoption. Welch's announcement quickly gained traction, with her video amassing over 260,000 views on X and nearly 700,000 on Instagram.

title: Russian attack on playground, residential building kills at least 4 in Ukraine
content: In Kharkiv, a Russian guided bomb hit a residential area, killing at least six people, including a child, and injuring more than 28. Mayor Ihor Terekhov detailed the tragic incident, emphasizing the loss on a playground. President Volodymyr Zelenskyy urged Western allies to authorize long-range strikes on Russian military air bases to deter future attacks.
summary: In Kharkiv, a Russian guided bomb hit a residential area, killing at least six people, including a child, and injuring more than 28. Mayor Ihor Terekhov detailed the tragic incident, emphasizing the loss on a playground. President Volodymyr Zelenskyy urged Western allies to authorize long-range strikes on Russian military air bases to deter future attacks.

title: Chaos at Disney World Florida: Fight and balloon pop sparks active shooter rumours
content: Mass panic erupted at Walt Disney World’s Magic Kingdom in Florida after a fight and the sound of a popping balloon led to false rumors of an active shooter. The chaos occurred around 10 pm as the park closed. Authorities quickly clarified there was no active shooter, and normal operations resumed shortly afterwards.
summary: Mass panic erupted at Walt Disney World’s Magic Kingdom in Florida after a fight and the sound of a popping balloon led to false rumors of an active shooter. The chaos occurred around 10 pm as the park closed. Authorities quickly clarified there was no active shooter, and normal operations resumed shortly afterwards.

title: Tragic! NHL star Johnny Gaudreau, brother killed by car in New Jersey, day before sister's wedding
content: Columbus Blue Jackets player Johnny Gaudreau and his brother Matthew died in a biking accident in New Jersey, allegedly involving a drunk driver. The driver has been arrested. Gaudreau's team issued a heartfelt statement. Johnny Gaudreau was an established NHL player with a lengthy career including nine seasons with the Calgary Flames before joining the Blue Jackets.
summary: Columbus Blue Jackets player Johnny Gaudreau and his brother Matthew died in a biking accident in New Jersey, allegedly involving a drunk driver. The driver has been arrested. Gaudreau's team issued a heartfelt statement. Johnny Gaudreau was an established NHL player with a lengthy career including nine seasons with the Calgary Flames before joining the Blue Jackets.

title: Who is Barry Stanton whose anti-Indian posts led to his ban on X?
content: The X account of Barry Stanton, with a verified status and over 1.8 lakh followers, was suspended after Indian users raised alarms about its offensive content towards Indian immigrants and other ethnicities. The account had been on the platform since before Twitter rebranded as X, and its authenticity remains ambiguous with speculation that it might have been a parody.
summary: The X account of Barry Stanton, with a verified status and over 1.8 lakh followers, was suspended after Indian users raised alarms about its offensive content towards Indian immigrants and other ethnicities. The account had been on the platform since before Twitter rebranded as X, and its authenticity remains ambiguous with speculation that it might have been a parody.

title: Did Kamala Harris work at a McDonald's? Why does it matter?
content: Republicans accuse Kamala Harris of fabricating her first employment at McDonald's, saying that it was not mentioned on her 1987 resume for a law clerk job. They claim this information remained missing from all aspects of Harris' life, from her biographies too until she ran for president in 2019. Democrats dismiss the claim and said it was just a summer job -- not worthy to find its place in the CV.
summary: Republicans accuse Kamala Harris of fabricating her first employment at McDonald's, saying that it was not mentioned on her 1987 resume for a law clerk job. They claim this information remained missing from all aspects of Harris' life, from her biographies too until she ran for president in 2019. Democrats dismiss the claim and said it was just a summer job -- not worthy to find its place in the CV.
